de.wirecard.epos.util

Class Constants.Timeout

  • de.wirecard.epos.util.Constants.Timeout
  • Enclosing class:
    Constants

    public class Constants.Timeout

    This constants represents timeouts defined in SDK in seconds.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long AFTER_SIGNATURE_CONFIRM
      Nothing happens after confirming the signature by merchant >>> 120 Sec timeout
      static long CARD_INSERT
      No swipe or no insertions of card or contact >>> 120 Sec timeout.
      static long EXTENSION_PAY_METHOD 
      static long MINIMIZED_APP 
      static long NOT_RESPONDING_DURING_REINITIALIZATION_TERMINAL
      If terminal is not initialized in sdk (after app started) and payment method CARD was chosen reinitialization will start. After timeout user need to restart bluetooth, because of some problematic devices (bluetooth may stuck)
      static long NOT_RESPONDING_DURING_UPDATE
      Firmware update timeout, 10 sec of no communication. If during the data transfer of firmware packages from app to the terminal, there is a timeout of 10 sec in between the packages transfer, we cancel the Firmware update. This can happen when there is no terminal response, or terminal is broken or there is network issue.
      static long PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION 
      static long RESTARTING_TERMINAL
      Restarting terminal timeout 60 sec.
      static long SELECT_DEVICE_OR_TYPE 
      static long SIGNATURE_CONFIRMATION
      Signature verification by the clerk, pressing the green confirmation button >>> 20 Seconds timeout
      static long SIGNATURE_REQUEST
      Signature input from buyer >>> 45 Sec timeout
      static long TERMINAL_INITIALIZATION
      Terminal unresponsive during initialization, waiting for re-plugin (bbpos only) or check for config file status/version/etc: 20 secs. Then terminate the payment process and with alert user with message
      static long TIMER_1
      Timer 1 - is for waiting a card to be presented. Our setup 120 Seconds.
      static long TIMER_2
      Timer 2 -is for "Authorized" or "Settings-up" or "Card entry error, please reinsert card" or "Use one card only", "Please try again", Payment outcome, "Try another card" or "Follow instructions on the mobile", "Not authorized" before falling forward for MasterCard for contactless, etc. This timer is used for generic message displaying, that does not require user data input. Our setup 2 Seconds.
      static long TIMER_3
      Timer 3 - is for prompts that require user active intervention like pressing a key to continue, providing the gratuities amount, confirming the signature, awaiting to remove the card, etc. Our setup 120 Seconds.

    • Field Detail

      • TIMER_1

        public static long TIMER_1

        Timer 1 - is for waiting a card to be presented. Our setup 120 Seconds.

      • TIMER_2

        public static long TIMER_2

        Timer 2 -is for "Authorized" or "Settings-up" or "Card entry error, please reinsert card" or "Use one card only", "Please try again", Payment outcome, "Try another card" or "Follow instructions on the mobile", "Not authorized" before falling forward for MasterCard for contactless, etc. This timer is used for generic message displaying, that does not require user data input. Our setup 2 Seconds.

      • TIMER_3

        public static long TIMER_3

        Timer 3 - is for prompts that require user active intervention like pressing a key to continue, providing the gratuities amount, confirming the signature, awaiting to remove the card, etc. Our setup 120 Seconds.

      • NOT_RESPONDING_DURING_UPDATE

        public static long NOT_RESPONDING_DURING_UPDATE

        Firmware update timeout, 10 sec of no communication. If during the data transfer of firmware packages from app to the terminal, there is a timeout of 10 sec in between the packages transfer, we cancel the Firmware update. This can happen when there is no terminal response, or terminal is broken or there is network issue.

      • NOT_RESPONDING_DURING_REINITIALIZATION_TERMINAL

        public static long NOT_RESPONDING_DURING_REINITIALIZATION_TERMINAL

        If terminal is not initialized in sdk (after app started) and payment method CARD was chosen reinitialization will start. After timeout user need to restart bluetooth, because of some problematic devices (bluetooth may stuck)

      • RESTARTING_TERMINAL

        public static long RESTARTING_TERMINAL

        Restarting terminal timeout 60 sec.

      • SIGNATURE_CONFIRMATION

        public static long SIGNATURE_CONFIRMATION

        Signature verification by the clerk, pressing the green confirmation button >>> 20 Seconds timeout

      • SIGNATURE_REQUEST

        public static long SIGNATURE_REQUEST

        Signature input from buyer >>> 45 Sec timeout

      • CARD_INSERT

        public static long CARD_INSERT

        No swipe or no insertions of card or contact >>> 120 Sec timeout.

      • AFTER_SIGNATURE_CONFIRM

        public static long AFTER_SIGNATURE_CONFIRM

        Nothing happens after confirming the signature by merchant >>> 120 Sec timeout

      • MINIMIZED_APP

        public static long MINIMIZED_APP

      • TERMINAL_INITIALIZATION

        public static long TERMINAL_INITIALIZATION

        Terminal unresponsive during initialization, waiting for re-plugin (bbpos only) or check for config file status/version/etc: 20 secs. Then terminate the payment process and with alert user with message

      • SELECT_DEVICE_OR_TYPE

        public static long SELECT_DEVICE_OR_TYPE

      • EXTENSION_PAY_METHOD

        public static long EXTENSION_PAY_METHOD

      • PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION

        public static long PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION
